entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
